component.name: getCourse
component.description: Get a single course by ID.

component.name: listCourses
component.description: List courses created in Canvas by the Instructor identified by the Access Token.

component.name: createCourse
component.description: Create a new course in Canvas.

component.name: listCourseUsers
component.description: List users associated with a course in Canvas.

component.name: getCourseUser
component.description: Get a single course user by ID.
